snippet: It is the responsibility of Israeli and Palestinian leaders to calm the volatile emotions that once again threaten both sides after the killings of four teenagers.
abstract: Editorial holds both Israeli and Palestinian leaders have responsibility to try to calm hostilities and violence that have arisen in response to killings of three Israeli teenagers and one Palestinian youth; warns atmosphere of prejudice and dehumanization is fueling a potentially vicious conflict; contends deaths should cause both communities to revisit need for permanent peace.
lead_paragraph: It is the responsibility of Israeli and Palestinian leaders to calm the volatile emotions that once again threaten both sides after the killings of four teenagers.

headline.seo: Can Israeli and Palestinian Leaders End the Revenge Attacks?
